message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  But we can negotiate if you want.
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me and 40% for you.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need more than 40%.  Let's try 80/20 this time.  It's a better deal for both of us than continuing this cycle.
I'm willing to compromise, 55% for me and 45% for you. Let's end this cycle before the money loses more value.
